questions.question: The impact of coronavirus on the US stock market was:

choices.answer: the stock market remained the same
the stock market dropped significantly
the stock market rose significantly
the stock market shut down

questions.question: Why would the American stock market suffer when coronavirus spread mostly in China?

choices.answer: China has the largest economy in the world
China’s stock market is the same as the US
The US owes China over $1 trillion in debt
Many American companies hire workers and suppliers in China

questions.question: In January 2020, Tesla and Ford responded to this situation with coronavirus by:

choices.answer: releasing new electric cars to boost sales
stopping all car sales across the world
closing down their factories in China
firing workers who had traveled to China

questions.question: In March of 2020, Twitter was the first major US corporation to:

choices.answer: tell its employees to work from home
find out an employee had coronavirus
offer coronavirus testing in their offices
ban coronavirus ads on their platform

questions.question: Which company below was able to thrive immediately after the coronavirus situation?

choices.answer: McDonald’s Corp.
Zoom Technologies Inc.
Apple Inc.
Amazon.com Inc.
